#labels Featured
#Using asDox with the Cheetah template engine

= Introduction =

This example shows how you can use asDox with Cheetah to create C# objects from Actionscript objects.


= Example =

{{{
from Cheetah.Template import Template
from asdox import asBuilder

builder = asBuilder.Builder()
builder.addSource("""
package com.gurufaction.myApp
{
	public class MyClass
        {
        	public var name:String;
                public var age:int;
        }
}
""")

pkg = builder.getPackage("com.gurufaction.myApp")

c_sharp_template = """
using System;

namespace $pkg.getName()
{
	#for $key,$value in $pkg.getClasses().items()
        #if $value.hasModifier("public") then 'public' else ''# class $value.getName()
        {
        	#for $key,$value in $value.getFields().items()
                #if $value.hasModifier("public") then 'public' else ''# $value.getType() $value.getName();
                #end for
        }
        #end for
}
"""
nameSpace = {'pkg': pkg}
t = Template(c_sharp_template, searchList=[nameSpace])
print t
}}}
=== Output ===
{{{
using System;

namespace com.gurufaction.myApp
{
        public class MyClass
        {
                public int age;
                public String name;
        }
}
}}}
